label: Clair weird checking
description: For badge randomization, ensure that clair actually doesn't care about you having the vanilla badge. Check is rerouted to the silver cave flypoint, which cannot be reached without beating clair in the first place

label: Whitney weird checking
description: For badge randomization, ensure that whitney actually doesn't care about you having the vanilla badge. Check is rerouted to the silver cave flypoint, which cannot be reached without beating whitney in the first place

label: Prevent bug catching contest softlock 1
description: During the bug catching contest, all itemballs are moved to inaccessible locations, to prevent the player from softlocking themselves by obtaining the unrandomized item

label: Prevent bug catching contest softlock 2
description: During the bug catching contest, all itemballs are moved to inaccessible locations, to prevent the player from softlocking themselves by obtaining the unrandomized item

label: Prevent the police aide bug
description: Ensures that talking to the policeman does not cause the aide to not give you pokeballs

label: Prevent the police aide bug, part 2
description: Ensures that talking to the policeman does not cause the aide to not give you pokeballs. Also ensures that the policeman doesn't permanently trap you in elm's lab when you don't have the egg

label: Prevent the police aide bug, part 3
description: Ensures that talking to the policeman does not cause the aide to not give you pokeballs. Also ensures that the policeman doesn't permanently trap you in elm's lab when you don't have the egg
